attributes.action: Give 99yr old Capt Tom Moore a Knighthood for raising £8mill (to date) for NHS
attributes.additional_details:
Because no one deserves it more, no one has captured the worlds imagination more...
For a soldier who served the queen, what a more fitting award is there?
attributes.background: Captain Tom Moore is a 99yr old man from Bedford who is walking around his garden and wanted to raise £1,000 but to date has raised over £8mill and rising... He has done more than anyone else.. He will be 100yrs old on 30/04/20 and what a desrerving award this would be.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
